sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Grid,Row,Col,Table,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; class Detail extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id: this.props.match.params.id.split('-')[0], } } componentDidMount(){ Axios.get('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/'+this.state.id+'?api_key=3fb35a358dae5edcaa04b777ba0b6ca3&language=en-US') .then((response)=>{ const genre = response.data.genres this.setState({genre}) this.setState({ title:response.data.title, adult:response.data.adult, language:response.data.spoken_languages['0'].name, overview:response.data.overview, path_image:response.data.poster_path, runtime:response.data.runtime, rating:response.data.vote_average, }) }) } render() { console.log(this.state.language) return (

{this.state.title}

{this.state.runtime} menit .{this.state.adult?'D':'Umum'}. 2018

{this.state.language}

{this.state.overview}

Rating {this.state.rating}
Genre {this.state.genre}
Durasi 96 m
Produksi MD entertaiment
Harga Rp. 50.000

Judul Serupa

BBB

Rp. A
); } } export default Detail;
